label: ABCD6E_tP40_86_e_c_ab_3g_d-001
title: ``Double-Double'' Perovskite CaMnCrSbO$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
There is some mixing on the nominal manganese, chromium, and antimony sites (Solana-Madruga, 2021)): \begin{itemize} \item Mn-I (2a) is 81\% Mn and 19\% Cr. \item Mn-II (2b) is 82\% Mn and 18\% Cr. \item Cr (4c) is 95.2\% Cr and 4.8\% Sb. \item Sb (4d) is 95.2\% Sb and 4.8\% Cr. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 This makes actual stoichiometry of this sample CaMn$_{0.815}$Cr$_{1.37}$SbO$_{6}$.
